User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://stylexio.in/sitemap.xml

# Disallow admin and private areas
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /_next/
Disallow: /static/

# Allow important pages
Allow: /about-us
Allow: /contact-us
Allow: /blog
Allow: /products
Allow: /categories

# Crawl delay (optional)
Crawl-delay: 1
